EmailTemplate.subject: The Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow is Coming to NC - Register Now!
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
<http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow> The Pivotal Cloud Platform Roadshow is coming to North Carolina. Please join Pivotal technologists in Raleigh on March 10th or Charlotte on March 12th to learn how to build and deploy great software on a modern cloud platform.
At this workshop, you’ll get hands-on experience as you test drive Pivotal’s CF platform. In just a few hours, you’ll realize the speed and ease of pushing an application on Pivotal CF.
Who Should Attend The workshops cover topics of interest to developers, architects, operations and technical managers. The keynotes set the stage for the workshops and will provide valuable insights for all.
AGENDA
8:00 AM – 9:00 AM Registration & Breakfast
9:00 AM – 10:00 AM Keynote: Software Kept Eating the World
10:00 AM – 10:10 AM Coffee Break
10:10 AM – 11:15 AM Session #1: The Developer Experience
11:15 AM – 11:30 AM Coffee Break
11:30 AM – 12:30 PM Session #2 - Architecture & Operations
12:30 PM – 2:00 PM Lunch & Afternoon Keynote: Continuous Delivery & Microservices
2:00 PM – 2:15 PM Coffee Break
2:15 PM – 4:00 PM Session #3 - Enabling Continuous Delivery
4:00 PM Wrap Up & End of Day
Register <https://pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow> now for this exclusive event. The workshop is FREE; space is limited. Raleigh-Durham TUESDAY March 10, 2015 Hilton Garden Inn Raleigh-Durham 4620 South Miami Blvd. Durham, NC 27703 REGISTER <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/raleighdurham> Charlotte THURSDAY March 12, 2015 Charlotte Marriott City Center 100 West Trade Street Charlotte, NC 28202 REGISTER <http://www.pivotal.io/platform-as-a-service/cloud-platform-roadshow/charlotte>
